data.text: Nakatambichizwa munhu yalechelwe nongwa ya heye,
Nakatambichizwa munhu yawele Mkulu Nguluwi hambe yamuwazile nongwa,
Mhela lombele ndilutilila kuleka kulonga gehile ga heni,
Nemisi na nechilo moko wa hegwe naunhunya,
Hamba nandonga gehile ga heni kwa hegwe,
Hegwe ndo honhu ha heni ha kivisa,
Uleche kuwa mpoka kota falasi ama falasi-idogowi,
Wanhu wehile wofichigwa na magazo menji,
Mtowe luchenze na kusangalala kwa chiwalo cha Mkulu Nguluwi hemwe watanganiche,
